actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to authorize the coinage of silver dollar coins to commemorate the life of Dr. Martin King, Jr. and to assist in the continuation of his nonviolent message by the designation of the Martin Luther King Center for Social Change to distribute said silver dollar coins.

summary.text: Authorizes the coinage of silver dollar coins to commemorate the life of Doctor Martin Luther King, Junior, and to assist in the continuation of his nonviolent message by the designation of the Martin Luther King Center for Social Change to distribute said silver dollar coins.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the coinage of silver dollar coins to commemorate the life of Dr. Martin King, Jr. and to assist in the continuation of his nonviolent message by the designation of the Martin Luther King Center for Social Change to distribute said silver dollar coins.
